title: PAACE Treasurer
description: Prepared the Pan-Asian Association for Cultural Exchange club budget of $2,300 and presented to the board for approval. Developed and maintained strategies for cash management, recording, and fundraising. Ensured that organization activities adhere to the budget.

title: Software Engineer Intern for Cloud Sweeper
description: Cloudsweeper is a research project being conducted by Chris Kanich at the University of Illinois at Chicago. It allows users to audit, encrypt, and redact sensitive information within cloud storage accounts. I assisted in developing the front end, utilizing 11ty (a static site generator) and ReactJS, as well as refactoring the backend in Python.

title: Crew Member at McDonalds
description: Maintained high standards of customer service during high-volume, fast paced operations. Resolved complaints promptly and professionally.Cross-trained and coordinated scheduling with team members to ensure seamless service.

title: Founder of Common Good Tutors
description: Started an organization that provided free 1-on-1 tutoring to 100+ high school students. Grew organization to 25+ tutors who collectively volunteered 400+ hours. Marketed service to entire school to attract both students who needed help and upperclassmen who could volunteer. Designed and executed strategy to scale service (balancing both tutors and tutees) during school year
